tasks.label: Set SSH key for Raspberry Pi
tasks.command: ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 && ssh-copy-id pi@${config:raspberryPi.host} && ssh pi@${config:raspberryPi.host} "echo 'Key successfully installed!'"

tasks.label: Build for Raspberry Pi
tasks.command: mkdir -p build-pi && cd build-pi && RASPBERRYPI=1 cmake .. && make

tasks.label: Deploy to Raspberry Pi
tasks.command: rsync -avz --progress ./build-pi/myapp pi@${config:raspberryPi.host}:~/myapp && ssh pi@${config:raspberryPi.host} 'chmod +x ~/myapp && echo "Deployment successful! Application is ready to run."'
